Content:: ANC Today is a weekly web-based newsletter published by the African National Congress (ANC). It consists mainly of updates on current programmes and initiatives of the ANC. In 2001, the ANC launched an online party newspaper ANC Today – Online Voice of the African National Congress to offset the alleged bias of the white-controlled press.[1][2] This South Africa-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: ANC Today - Wikipedia
